mapper.select: SELECT activity.actID, COUNT(userID) as userJoinedNum, title, startDate, location, price, capacity, imgs, additionalInfoJSON, description, imgs FROM signup_activity RIGHT JOIN activity ON activity.actID = signup_activity.actID WHERE activity.startDate > 0 GROUP BY activity.actID, title, startDate, location, price, capacity, imgs, additionalInfoJSON, description ORDER BY activity.actID ASC
